attributes.additional_details: Being talks as bipartisan between all political parties in the UK, for the government to talk with our counterparts in Australia, Canada and New Zealand. Not only this will ensure security in a instability world, but also helping with each other with trade deals as a block but also beginning of what it should have been the Prime Ministers from all four with consent from each Parliament with certain negotiations. Helping with trade, defence and cultures.
attributes.background: Being talks with Canada, New Zealand and Australia to form a new organisation. Not only this tightens the West and East of the World but also help with defence, strength of cultures, economically and strengthen the Commonwealth's big four United.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/708393
